profile.name: Thomas Kangah
profile.title: Health Administrator & HEALTH TECH 4 Africa Founder
profile.bio: Experienced Health Administrator and visionary founder of HEALTH TECH 4 Africa, dedicated to leveraging technology for improved healthcare outcomes across the African continent. Passionate about infodemic management, health information systems, and digital health innovation.

experiences.title: Founder & CEO
experiences.description: Founded and lead a pioneering health technology organization focused on improving healthcare delivery across Africa through innovative digital solutions and strategic partnerships.
achievements: Established partnerships with major health organizations across 15+ African countries
Led development of health information management systems
Spearheaded infodemic management initiatives during COVID-19 pandemic
Mentored 50+ health tech entrepreneurs and startups

experiences.title: Senior Health Administrator
experiences.description: Managed comprehensive health administration programs, focusing on health information systems implementation and policy development.
achievements: Implemented digital record systems across 25+ healthcare facilities
Reduced administrative overhead by 40% through process optimization
Led cross-functional teams of 30+ healthcare professionals

experiences.title: Health Information Systems Specialist
experiences.description: Specialized in designing and implementing health information systems to support evidence-based decision making in public health.
achievements: Trained 200+ healthcare workers on digital systems
Improved data quality and reporting accuracy by 60%
Contributed to national health digitization strategy

projects.title: Health Tech Africa CDC Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive health technology platform designed to support CDC initiatives across Africa, featuring infodemic management tools and public health monitoring systems.

projects.title: African Health Data Initiative
projects.description: Multi-country initiative to standardize health data collection and reporting across African healthcare systems.

projects.title: Digital Health Training Platform
projects.description: E-learning platform designed to train healthcare workers on digital health tools and infodemic management strategies.
